title: Connection time out
body: Earlier last week I started to get connection time out constantly through out a whole game. So I restarted, did system recovery, checked my system for errors and called my isp to do a connection check. Everything on my end was fine. I gave it a few days rest and it stopped. Then it's started up again today. I did the most recent update today so idk if that has anything to do with it but atm this game is unplayable for me and I'm almost certainly convinced it's something to do with the client. Even before the game started my pre-match lobby chat lagged. Does anyone know of a current bug or something in the client regarding getting timed out?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you please do the following for me;

* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and the url to your ICSI netalyzr results.
